medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain began in the morning, associated with nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea after having a hamburger the previous night. The abdominal pain was primarily in the upper abdomen and radiated to the back, not relieved by Motrin. Pain intensity is described as severe. Multiple episodes of nonbilious vomiting and diarrhea occurred, with no bowel movements since a few days prior. Similar pain was experienced six months ago, lasting a day without requiring medical intervention.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Breast cancer s/p radiation therapy; Diabetes Mellitus type 2; Hypertension; Hypercholesterolemia; Partial Mastectomy.
